alert.note: Alert for Polk (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued August 19 at 6:10PM CDT until August 19 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM CDT THIS EVENING FOR SOUTHERN POLK COUNTY... At 610 PM CDT, Doppler radar and automated rain gauges indicated thunderstorms have produced rain across the warned area of 2 to 4 inches of rain have fallen. While the rain has currently ended, additional thunderstorms are likely to pass into the warned area between 7 to 8 pm which may cause conditions to worsen once again. HAZARD...Flash flooding caused by thunderstorms. SOURCE...Radar, automated gauges and law enforcement reports. IMPACT...Flash flooding of small creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses as well as other poor drainage and low-lying areas. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Des Moines, West Des Moines, Urbandale, Clive, Altoona, Pleasant Hill, Windsor Heights, Mitchellville, Iowa State Fairgrounds, Principal Park, Iowa Events Center, Drake Stadium And Knapp Center, Adventureland Amusement Park, Prairie Meadows, Des Moines Int`l Airport, Merle Hay Mall, Valley West Mall and Walnut Woods State Park. Reports have been received of water flowing over Hickman Road near 24th street with stranded cars near the intersection. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR AND GAUGE INDICATED
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
